pcsite.title: AMM
pcsite.descTitle: "AMM" is a platform featuring interactive variety entertainment and the only Internet video platform under Asia TV.
pcsite.descDetail: "AMM" provides users with rich, high-definition and smooth professional video experience, and is committed to let people get more and better videos on an equal and convenient basis. AMM mainly provides diversified products and services such as video, live broadcast, film industry, and news. In the future, "AMM" will continue to exert its strength in the fields of diversified content reserves, personalized product experience and customized marketing services, leading the revolution in video experience.
